parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Move soldier into vehicle commander position (Immediate, no animation).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unitName '''moveInCommander''' vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_soldierOne '''moveInCommander''' _tankOne </code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[moveInAny]], [[moveInCargo]], [[moveInDriver]], [[moveInGunner]], [[moveInTurret]], [[assignAsCargo]], [[assignAsCommander]], [[assignAsDriver]], [[assignAsGunner]]
</value></part></template>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 4, 2006 - 14:43</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Hardrock|hardrock]]<dd class="note">''Notes from before the conversion:''

MP Note Functions MoveInCommander can only be called for local soldiers. They will be ignored for remote soldiers. (see [[Locality in Multiplayer]])


<dt class="note">[[User:Ceeeb|Ceeeb]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
In '''OFP v1.96''', the moveIn commands will not trigger an associated getIn [[Operation_Flashpoint:_EventHandlers_List|event]]. To ensure the getIn event is fired, use the "getIn Commander" [[Operation_Flashpoint:_Actions_List|action]] command.


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
